Package etri.sdn.controller.module.statemanager

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ModuleListSerializer
    A Custom Serializer that serialize OFController.
    ModuleListSerializerModule
    A Custom Serializer module that consists of ModuleListSerializer and ModuleSerializer.
    ModuleSerializer
    A Custom Serializer for OFModule class.
    OFFeaturesReplySerializer
    A Custom Serializer for OFFeaturesReply (FEATURES_REPLY) message.
    OFFeaturesReplySerializerModule
    A Custom Serializer Module which consists of OFFeaturesReplySerializer and OFPhysicalPortSerializer
    OFFlowStatisticsReplySerializerModule
    A Custom Serializer module consists of OFFlowStatisticsReplySerializer
    OFMatchSerializer
    Custom serializer for OFMatch message.
    OFMStateManager
    This module does not handle any OFMessage.
    OFPhysicalPortSerializer
    A Custom Serializer for OFPhysicalPort object.
    State
    Model that represents the internal data of OFMStateManager.
